verses.roman:
jaya jaya mahāprabhu śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya
tāṅhāra caraṇāśrita yei, sei dhanya

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; mahāprabhu—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—known as Kṛṣṇa Caitanya; tāṅhāra caraṇa-āśrita—all who have taken shelter at His lotus feet; yei—anyone; sei—he is; dhanya—glorious.
translation: All glories to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu! Anyone who has taken shelter at His lotus feet is glorious.
